tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ***** ****** * * ******** **** *** ****** *** *** ************** ******** . A great teacher for his fraternity by teaching thru the book " Basal Implantology Simplified : 5x Your Implant Practice"and the  in person. Inshort a very impressive personality. 

The treatment was flawless , systematic and brisk.

Dr. Bhavana Premchandran , with her gentle hands and her caring nature is an outstanding asset to Trisha Dental Dental Solutions. 

Would recommend, without a second thought, to get the treatment under the supervision of Dr. Rohan Virani . 

The staff at the dental clinic is full of positivity and a nature to co operate and answer our questions literally at any time. ( Thank you Dimple for your reciprocals) 

True to its name , as a whole , they are a solution to the dental problems.

I thank you all , wholeheartedly , for the comfortable journey I went thru without any hassles.

A seven stars as 5 star is too low for you guys.
reply_text: Thank you for amazing feedback . We are glad we could give you a pain-free amazing expierence

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I am from  Nairobi  Kenya . A few years ago I read about Dr Rohan and decided to come and see him for some dental work and my wife and I were very impressed with his treatment. From that day we all our dental treatment is done by him.
During the covid  lock down we could not leave Kenya and had to bear with the dental pain.
We tried our local dentists but were not happy at all. We came here as soon as the Kenya opened up 
WE are very happy with his treatment and have recommended him to all our friends.

review:
Mr Rohan Virano is well Experienced Doctor and has handled the whole treatment with ease.  I didn't face any problems or difficulties. the treatment went of very smooth. 
As regards cost Implant under swiss methodology is a bit expensive than the normal placing of implants. In the normal route, the waiting period is between 3-4 months and under Swiss Methodology, it is 8 to 10 days and u get the whole exercise done. Both the methodology has their own advantages/disadvantages. 
I am happy with the treatment provided to me By Dr Rohan Virani.
reply_text: thnk you for ur valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have been going to Trisa Dental Solution for a while now and always had been well taken care of my dental problems. It's clearly evident of how well they serve their patients and there concerns even in the times of Covid 19 lockdown situation. They took utmost precautions of asking to install and share the results of Arogya setu app before finalizing the appointment, wearing PPE kits for themselves & patients, but also make sure to attend one patient  at a time and cleaning the clinic well before & after treating each one of them. 

Thanks Team Trisa for always being a thoroughly professional and still friendly, you guys are doing a fab job.
reply_text: thank you we are glad we could help you in such situation

Dear my sushil we are glad that your root canal treatment was a great expierence. however it seems your frustration is more to the fact that you kept asking for huge discounts in your dad's  treatment which were refused from our end.

Your dad requires dental implant and approx cost per implant is 25000/- across most centres which for some reason you found high 

Though all feedbacks are welcome unnecessarily criticizing Dr on social media as certain discount couldn't be provided is unwarranted 

Regards Dr Rohan virani

reply_text:
Thank you for feedback..admist this corona issue ..drs are risking their life putting hands in mouths of unknown patients..i doubt  any money paid can be termed expensive..

we always provide quotes before treatment .we invest  in latest technology  and global safety measure's  for our patient comfort and safety.
Cheaper treatment options could be  available  in government  hospitals and charitable institutions .
Our usp is quality of work and not providing cheap dentistry
